name: Preschool (3.5 - 4.5 years)
description: Primeros Pasos Preschool is open Monday – Friday from 8:00 a.m. to 5:30 p.m. at both Noe and Silver Park locations. We offer full day options only. Both locations offer a 5 day option, and Silver Park also offers 3 and 2 day options. - 5 days: Monday-Friday - 3 Days (Silver Park only): Monday, Wednesday and Friday - 2 Days (Silver Park only): Tuesday and Thursday Preschool (ages 3.5 - 4.5 years) Schedule: - 8:00 - 9:00 a.m. Dropoff - 9:15 a.m. Morning Snack - 12:15 p.m. Lunch (brought from home)

Both locations offer a 5 day option, and Silver Park also offers 3 and 2 day options. - 5 days: Monday-Friday - 3 Days (Silver Park only): Monday, Wednesday and Friday - 2 Days (Silver Park only): Tuesday and Thursday Preschool (ages 3.5 - 4.5 years) Schedule: - 8:00 - 9:00 a.m. Dropoff - 9:15 a.m. Morning Snack - 12:15 p.m. Lunch (brought from home)
howToGetIt: For information or question email: admissions@primerospasossf.com Application Process: After your tour, a provided link to an application form via an email. Admission Decisions: Silver Park: admissions decisions are usually sent within two weeks following your tour. Noe Valley: admissions decisions are sent on the common SF Preschool acceptance date, in March of each year for the following September - August school year. Enrollment: To confirm enrollment, please respond to the Admission Decision email and remit the annual enrollment fee by the deadline indicated in the offer email.
cost: This is a fee based service.. Sliding scale with proof of income requirements.
